function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Empirical analysis based on PCA and cluster analysis","Impact":"Incorrect classification of banks' soundness","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough validation of the PCA and cluster analysis results","Technologies":"Statistical software for PCA and cluster analysis","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Calculation of soundness based on financial variables","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of banks' stability and soundness","Mitigation":"Validation of selected variables and data accuracy verification","Technologies":"Financial modeling and analysis software","People":"Research team, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Preliminary tests for KMO and Bartlett tests","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of sampling adequacy and sphericity","Mitigation":"Validation of test results and consulting with statistical experts","Technologies":"Statistical software for tests","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"}]}
